My colleagues and I are calling on the U.S. News to comprehensively update their rankings to ensure they incentivize policies and practices that increase access to schools that transform the lives of underrepresented and disadvantaged students. 
https://www.washingtonpost.com/education/2018/12/03/senators-urge-us-news-overhaul-college-ranking-formula/

Our public lands include some of the most diverse landscapes in the country. As our cities and urban areas grow, we must strengthen protections for public lands and expand access to outdoor recreational opportunities for Californians and visitors.

Our brave firefighters truly do put their lives on the line, each and every day they’re on the job. My heart goes out to the entire @WorcesterFD, as well as the family and friends of Firefighter Christopher Roy. https://twitter.com/worcesterfd/status/1071800474846814209 QT @WorcesterFD The Worcester Fire Department mourns the line of duty death of FF Christopher Roy who courageously battled a 5 alarm fire on Lowell St. All responding firefighters & crews displayed supreme heroism under extreme conditions. We ask you to keep the family of FF Roy in your thoughts http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Dt_M2P4W0AAEDBB.jpg

ICYMI: I’m calling for the immediate release of documents related to Roxsana Hernández, who was a transgender woman that died while in ICE and CBP custody. We deserve answers. 
https://www.thecut.com/2018/12/roxana-hernndez-a-transgender-woman-died-in-ice-custody.html

RT @FaceTheNation .@AdamSchiff on the Russia Investigation: My takeaway is there's a very real prospect that on the day Donald Trump leaves office the justice department may indict him. That he may be the first president in quite some time to face the real prospect of jail time. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1071794105490030592/pu/img/2D-hPXnI22Q41Cfm.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1071794105490030592/pu/vid/320x180/Dk0277E2vjkHaYGN.mp4?tag=6
America can — and must — meet the challenge of climate change head-on. It’s up to us to do what is necessary to secure a safe, healthy future for generations to come.

As head of the @EPA, Andrew Wheeler is supposed to regulate the coal industry. Instead, the former coal lobbyist is making it easier for his buddies to pollute our air. My plan to #EndCorruptionNow would slam the revolving door shut on ex-lobbyists like Wheeler. https://twitter.com/time/status/1070845376461193216 QT @TIME EPA eases rules on coal industry despite climate change warnings http://mag.time.com/x8xfTee
